website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich system with great-tasting results, although some people doubt its ability to reduce impurities.
pros: Impressive 10-stage filtration system with alkaline-balancing component
Capable of producing up to 100 gallons daily
cons: Some water test results show only minor improvements in the reduction of impurities
The lines occasionally vibrate when the water tank is full

customer_reviews.title: Worth Everu Penny
customer_reviews.text: Moved into our new home recently and we are use to purified water. After researching products from different venders including our old system I decided to purchase this model. I wanted a healthier water drinking source and I didn't want to spend a lot of money. Plus I wanted a good water flow. This system does it all! PH Blalanced Water Taste Good 100 Gallons A Day Very Affordable I did have someone install it he did it in under an hour :) It's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: DJ2BIG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have well water that has high nitrates and sodium levels and it tastes bad. The system comes assembled with exception to the pre/post carbon and sediment filters so it's super easy to install. I had added a de-ionization cartridge before the remineralization cartridge and man it's some of the best water I have ever had. Does a great job. I would recommend this to any one looking for clean pure water. Our parts per million count prior to the filter is over 650. Coming out of the de-ionizer it's 0! I'd say that's pure. After the remineralization cartridge our ph is in the 8-8.5 range. So it's clean and healthy for my family.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: A Girl Installed
customer_reviews.text: To start I want to say I LOVE this system! It took me about 3-4 hours to install but only took that long because I am a super cautious person and wanted to make sure I got it right the first time since you need to cut hoses and drill into things. I also had to end up drilling a hole in my sink for the faucet which took me some time. The video they made truly makes this install super easy to follow and complete A++ on their instructions. If you are drinking bottled water, save your time and money dealing with that and install this GREAT product. I have had for 3 months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I changed out an aged Culligan RO system that I had trouble with and whose yearly maintenance would cost more than this replacement. This system has twice the capacity and was easy to install. I'm very handy in plumbing though and used the existing drain connections and water supply lines to speed up the install. My install was under 30 minutes. I had a little problem with one of the hose adapters, which are loaded with Teflon, not wanting to seat straight but after a little work it went in correctly. Highly recommend that you watch the install video on the Express Water website. Water tastes excellent. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer- HEspinoza

customer_reviews.title: Quality system Great price Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were VERY clear and easy to follow. The work under the sink was easy. Very happy with how pre-assembled it was. Just connect pre-assembly to pre-assembly. If you are wondering if you can install this yourself, the hardest part was adding the faucet on the counter top. If you have a pre-drilled sink/soap hole, it's an easy job. Drilling out a granite counter is "easy" but also mistakes are forever so I would hire a pro. Fast water flow, seems to meet all specs. I was looking for Alkaline water that is not devoid of minerals to supply my espresso machine. Works great. Did not do any Water TDS testing. This kit adds TDS via mineral packs.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Lagers

customer_reviews.title: RO water system and taste
customer_reviews.text: I had a plumber friend install it to make sure it is done properly, it cost me a few bucks but it gives me a peace of mind knowing it will not leak. The system worked as advertised. The compactness of the unit fir under a small sink area (see pictures). As for the taste, I would let the system fill up overnight and then run the water dispenser for 10- 20 minutes to flush out the initial sediments and then use the water. Now that it's in, everyone in the family is drinking more water and it tastes as good as the bottled Alkaline waters.
customer_reviews.author: SharpSound

customer_reviews.title: Great water filtration system
customer_reviews.text: We received our Express water 10 Stage about a week ago. Instalation went smoothly and we are loving the results. The water tastes very fresh. No chlorine taste or smell..Very happy knowing not only are we getting good filtered water for our bodies but so are our 3 Australian Shepherds. That's a BIG deal for us
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G Shull

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tasting water; get the 100 GPD model
customer_reviews.text: This unit was a joy to install; it included all the hardware needed. The only glitch was that the supplied pressure gauge blew out when I pressurized the unit. Apparently, the push fittings could not grip the metal male connector on the gauge. I installed a plug where the gauge would go and problem solved. The water tastes great and it makes plenty of it. I recommend spending a little extra on the 100 gallon per day model as it will produce water at a respectable rate even if you run the accumulator tank empty. The faucet is also of high quality and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This filter is awesome!!  READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE YOU BEGIN
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before we bought this. It is not difficult to install, just remember to push the plastic lines FIRMLY into the correct places and it wont leak. We are on a private well and were hesitant about drinking the water. Now, I am glad we bought the filter system! The sediment filter shows tan from all the stuff it has filtered out. After the 5th flush, I tasted the water and it is great. No more rotten egg smell or aftertaste. Good bye bottled water and all the expense involved with that!! It took us about 1 1/2 hrs to install. The most difficult thing was finding a comfortable spot to perch under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Double H Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Biggest bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this water system and it is amazing! I tested the water and it blows everything out of the water(hahaha)! The results I got from testing multiple waters is as follows: Whole Foods alkaline water at 99cents/gallon: 7.3pH and 185 TDS(total dissolved solids) Regular tap water: 7.3pH and 222 TDS Kagen water system (with bad filter): 7.2pH and 352 TDS 7 leaves water: 7.5pH and 77 TDS Marina High school water in orange county: 7.4pH and 241 TDS Express water filtration system: 9.1pH and 78 TDS Bottled Kirkland Alkaline water: 8.3pH and 33 TDS As you can see it has the highest pH and 2nd best TDS results
customer_reviews.author: Duy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Flavor took some getting used too but overall I'm very happy with this filtration system. My only complaint is that the water pressure is reduced when going through the fridge which is normal. But it still is a pain, we're trying to plan ahead for family gatherings to make sure we don't run out of water filling a large amount of cups at once. It takes awhile to fill the tank back. I was skeptical at first but I really am very happy with this purchase, as far as alkalinity I have not checked.
customer_reviews.author: Carter2806

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting water I've ever had and also says my wife. Excellent support from Express water and willingness to help on any concern. I actually drink more water than ever before where my liquids were four coffees a day and one glass of water. I now drink one cup of black coffee at room temperature lasting over four or more hours a day and the best tasting cup of coffee. The best thing I've bought in two years and at a great price plus health benefits to add to healthy food choices. Thank you, Chris
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Towles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Comes pretty much together out of the box. Just follow the instructions and hook the right colored lines up and you are good to go. Naturally it took about 2-3 hours for me being a big guy working in a very small place, but had no problems at all. Followed the instructions exactly for first use and I have perfect tasting water. Has good flow also, which surprised me. I was expecting a slow trickle of water flow. Highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: James Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend it enough!! FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this more highly then I do. I have researched reverse osmosis systems for some time before making this purchase, and I am absolutely satisfied what this product for the price point. It is exactly what I wanted, and it has helped me save money and drink more water. The flavor is great, so clean and refreshing. Installation was simple enough, the instructions were very easy to follow, and installation should go smoothly if instructions are followed. I highly recommend this product. Anyone who constantly buys alkaline water or filtered water of any kind should invest in this product and save themselves time, money and poor health in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Heretic

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. We have had it for about three months ...
customer_reviews.text: First RO system I have installed, and it works great. We have had it for about three months now, and I am happy to recommend it to anyone looking for an RO system. I just added in the ice maker to the fridge last week, and there is plenty of output for both the RO faucet and the ice maker. One concern I had with installing an RO system was they can make the water acidic unless you have an alkaline stage. This unit was the lowest priced offering from a reputable supplier that has the additional alkaline stage, and it does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: J.Wood

customer_reviews.title: Delicious water
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes excellent bought this because of the great reviews and was not disappointed. I wait 24 hours then emptied the thank and waited for it to refill before enjoying my water. I’ve been enjoying it since. I connected it to my fridge and ice maker as well and couldn’t be happier. I also love the fact that it has a leak fail safe installed into this system. If you accidentally don’t correctly tighten your filter and it leaks it will shut off the whole system and not leak water everywhere. Very clever and idiot proof love it.
customer_reviews.author: WAN

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for flow rate.
customer_reviews.text: Water is great. Install wasn't extremely difficult. My problem is that the water flows out very slowly, about half the rate as old one we replaced. If not for that, it would be 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, it does ‘waste’ some water, ok to install
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new RO water. The taste is crisp And I feel like I’m getting better hydration. I can tell the difference when my husband fills up the hydro flask with the RO water or water from the fridge which only has a carbon filter. The only slight annoyance I have is you can hear the tank filling up (sounds like draining a sink) after using 8+oz. I don’t know how much it has affected our water bill yet we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great tasting water, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Its so nice not having my coffee pot get all gross with buildup now that I use this filter. The water tastes amazing. The installation was as smooth as could be. This came so neatly packaged. Express water: Pat yourselves on the back. Well done, keep it up! While you're at it, start up a replacement filter subscription box.. make it so the proper filter comes at the exact time it needs to be replaced! yay! ;P
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this system. Great tasting water. I tested the Akalinity with drops and was very pleased with the results. I was able to install the system by myself ( I am definitely no plumber). Easy to follow instructions. Only issues I had initially was leaks due to me not pushing the hoses in far enough. Once I realized and corrected it, no problems. I very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MS GAL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Water - Better than bottled!
customer_reviews.text: This system is amazing! We tested our water for all kinds of things and we had a large amount of iron and copper. Our TDS (Total Dissolved Solids) reading out of the tap was 229. Should be below 100. We tested after installing the system and it was 22! A bottled water from the store was 25. After six months it was time to change some of the filters and we were shocked to see what was in the SED and ACB filters! You may be thinking the system is pricey, but it’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: chad urdahl

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for almost one year and was experiencing a bad taste from the R/O water. Called customer service and they were great. She walked me through some trouble shooting steps and when that didn't change the water taste, she is sending me a new head unit at no cost to me. No other problems with the system but customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Slvfox

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed at first because it didn’t work as expected with my water pressure. Water was coming very slowly and it measured 300 ppm, which is unacceptable. I decided to try a water pressure booster and it resolve the problem. I’m now getting between 30 and 50 ppm consistently (down from 700 ppm without it). Taste is good. Let’s see what the operation cost will be over time.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't increase ph
customer_reviews.text: I did not noticed any increase in my ph. It shows the same ph as my tap.
customer_reviews.author: Yangimage

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like spring water
customer_reviews.text: The water produced by this filter tastes like spring water and does not end up with a gross taste after sitting for a day, unlike the tap water feeding into it. Installation wasn't too difficult, and the pressure relief mechanism alerted me to the failure of my home's pressure reducing valve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filtered water, ice maker, and kuerig supply line
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments I've made. I have the ice maker and Keurig coffee maker hooked up to filtered lines as well with a simple t connectors. (Kuerig water line ball float valve on eBay). Crazy the difference it makes.
customer_reviews.author: s bell

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a reverse osmosis system
customer_reviews.text: Easy to instal. Works flawlessly. Great tasting water. This is my second reverse osmosis system. I ordered a similar one to this at my last house. This one I tried the clear filters and I enjoy being able to see the filters a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Best item I've bought all year
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this!!!! The water tastes great, even the kids are happy to drink it all the time. Our water from the tap is not great at all. When we fill our giant water bottle with this water it's perfect. We've saved so much plastic waste and it's much better for our health over all.
customer_reviews.author: Meemee Brown

customer_reviews.title: awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Super easy for a technical person to install. I'm A pipe fitter and had a blast installing this little unit. Clear directions a kid could understand. Saved the COLORFUL FULLY ILLUSTRATED directions to show my kids how stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Ema

customer_reviews.title: This works very well and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this a good review but I'd like to give it a great review. My family and I are drinking more water since this was installed. It really tastes great. This was easy to assemble with very clear instructions. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Molitor

customer_reviews.title: Great ro system
customer_reviews.text: Great ro system for the price. Water taste great and was super easy to install. All hoses are color coded and all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter. Clean Alcaline Water without Poisonous Fluoride
customer_reviews.text: Great Reverse Osmosis Filter. Installation took about 2 hours. You will need to connect hoses and drill 2 holes, one in a sink to install Water Tap, and one in a drain pipe. Clear Filter Housing is great, you can observe amount of debris and rust in first 3 large canisters.
customer_reviews.author: ValeriaBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Love this system!
customer_reviews.text: Love this RO system. I measured the water hardness before and after. This system dropped the harness to 30 ppm from 360 ppm and the water tastes great. Way better than bottled name brands
customer_reviews.author: Crulpower

customer_reviews.title: The Best Purchase for my Family in 2019
customer_reviews.text: This may be easy to install, but I paid a plumber to do it for me and he took a little time getting it done. I thought it would be easier for him. I'm handy but I am glad I paid a professional anyway. The product works great and as expected! I love the fresh clean water for drinking and cooking. So glad I pulled the trigger on this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water, Great System!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely proud of my Express Water system. I live in an area where water from the tap is not drinkable. This system was super easy to install myself! This system filters the water and returns minerals that make the water taste great! I have had other R.O. systems that could not keep the water tasting good, and filters had to be replaced every other month. This system is WELL worth the money spent and helps me save money on water costs. Thanks Express Water!
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled me
customer_reviews.text: I can't drink water that's not from my filtered system. I also use this for watering my sensitive plants and for my animals (they won't drink anything else unless they have to now).
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Read first
customer_reviews.text: High quality.. This one without pump... So if your source water not pressurized don't take this one or you must install water pump to make filtration
customer_reviews.author: Sami Almokhalfi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the 5-stage RO water filter system and this is my first 6-stage RO filter system witht he additional mineral filter. Easy to install with the quick connectors which I hope will last and won't leak. That's the only unknown factor of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Yardbird_88

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: comes in a nice box with everything you need to install minus some drilling and labor. Overall very satisfied with how its holding up and how it is filtering the water. No more chlorine smell with sulfur.
customer_reviews.author: XP

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazingly clean
customer_reviews.text: I like that it took the sulfer smell and taste completely out . What I am not sure of is the amount of waste water made in order to clean the water . There is a bypass line that hools to your drain and I'm not sure how long the bypass is open bit the water is amazing . Want to buy the uv filter to add to my system and we'll be great
customer_reviews.author: Todd Glasser

customer_reviews.title: Great testing water. Best price. Quality construction and easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Exchanged this for the next higher model. Same thing + UV chamber. Easy setup, great water, don't even buy bottled water anymore. 2 months in use, so far no complaints. Added permeate pump and replaced flow restrictor with the flow 350 to increase efficiency. Going to need a 1/4" drill bit for the drain, and a drill bit for the faucet don't remember that size. Maybe 3/4"
customer_reviews.author: RYDE_79

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water, excellent system!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fairly easy to install with the exception of trying to seat the filters and the o rings on the unit so they dont leak. Love this unit, water tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Color coded made it easy to install, only used direction to check my work. Family glad I bought. Water taste good. Hooked up to the fridge and now we have clear ice and don't have to buy it every other day.
customer_reviews.author: james evensen

customer_reviews.title: Best setup for nasty water.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy instructions. Buy extra adapter on amazon for hooking up to the refrigerator etc....
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, water tastes great, and the price is right. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: George Cascio

customer_reviews.title: Water taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My son installed this for me since I didn't have the tools or physical ability. Now that it's installed it's amazing, I will be saving a ton over paying for water cooler 5 gallon jugs which were almost impossible to carry for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting water!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have well water and this makes our water taste so delicious! It was easy to install and keeps up with all the water lovers in the family! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzzanne Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This filter comes with great instructions for installation and works well once installed. I needed to purchase a few fittings to make it work for my particular installation. Water tastes great and it looks like filter replacement will be easy.
customer_reviews.author: NCILMfisher

customer_reviews.title: Good service. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had an install question. Called and was helped right away. They test each one before shipping it. It's worked very well so far and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bellew

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT & EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: We decided to replace our existing (RainSoft) system; as we found the filters too costly and used special filters that were hard to find; unknown when purchased.... So installation was extra simple; when replacing existing system; as most of the hard parts; are already done!!! This system is much better than our pre-existing (3-stage) system; and new system was cheaper than replacing old filters!
customer_reviews.author: vbsweb.net

customer_reviews.title: Its water a staple of life ..people forget that
customer_reviews.text: Great p RC oduct just wish there was one that the filters were good for a longer
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Goldsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Video instruction very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Better price .But a faucet hex nut was very difficult tight in .
customer_reviews.author: thinh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. I am no expert and it takes about 60 minutes if you have all the tools to install it. The instructions are easy to follow and I am sure it can be install in less time but I took my time with it to make sure there was no leak.
customer_reviews.author: JrBatista

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. I put this in my 5th wheel. My little dog will have fresh water everywhere we go
customer_reviews.author: erika l. huffman

customer_reviews.title: Drink mineral water water from your home!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you follow the instructions. Very good taste of water. My wife likes the taste of water. This is the greatest certification I can get
customer_reviews.author: Anurg

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been a good buy no problems and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good buy no problems and easy installation. I am pleased with this unit and purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ... the system for five days and so far I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Been using the system for five days and so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: they were precise and easily followed. After purging the system as instructed
customer_reviews.text: I received my purchase in 2 days and was equally impressed with the instillation instructions, they were precise and easily followed . After purging the system as instructed, the water tasted great and the faucet had a great amount of flow for an R.O. system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baney

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit! We installed it under out sink easily (ish), and the water tastes amazing! Better than buying bottled, or using a filter pitcher all the time.
customer_reviews.author: A.OK

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter!
customer_reviews.text: Great reverse osmosis with ph. Makes plenty of clean drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: Coach DJ

customer_reviews.title: Clear and simple installation instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Connected to refrigerator home drinking water and ice maker system provides excellent quality byproducts.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Perez-Bayon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Great tasting water with minerals added back! I'm glad I got this system.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product looks good and water taste also very good and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit...very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit...Very easy to install...found one minor leak on the out of the RO membrane but I cut another tube and fixed that easily. My water TDS goes from 260TDS on tap incoming to 30TDS at the drinking faucet.....at the RO membrane output I got 16 TDS....a slight raise in TDS probably from the mineral alkaline stage add-on. Overall 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kauss Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Hex Nut of Faucet set damaged
customer_reviews.text: The Hex Nut of Faucet set is damaged from factory
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Gre
customer_reviews.text: Great water, coffee is better tasting. Easy to install, but it takes a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Water color
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this system and I see a different color, it looks like some bubbles or foam, this is normal, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great water system. We've had it for a year and no issues or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John Lupiezowiec

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to see how great the quality and craftsmanship was of the Reverse Osmosis ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how great the quality and craftsmanship was of the Reverse Osmosis system. My water tastes amazing. Best investment I've ever made on AMAZON!!! Thank you for changing my life.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great was easy to install. Fast shipping. Everything is color coded. Only took about an hr
customer_reviews.author: Austin Streff

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline filter doesn't work as well as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well enough. Not as many bubbles as my last one which is nice. Also, the alkaline filter definitely makes the water taste better than without, but it doesn't add enough. I have separate electrolyte drops and a few of those makes it taste perfect, like bottled water. Bottom line, it works fine, just a little disappointed in the alkaline filter, doesn't improve the taste as much as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Very good system. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very good system. Easy to install! Been 4 days now and I feel the difference in drinking the alkaline water. A lot more energy and feel over all better
customer_reviews.author: Chris Woinarowicz

customer_reviews.title: No More Bottled Water
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and it works great - a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: I live in Los Angeles tap water condition not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I live in Los Angeles tap water condition not bad at all, I used Apec RO brand more than 15 years without any complaint. I want to try Alkaline water to see how it taste, first few days ok then getting bad taste all my kids vomit . I don't know this set defect or ... I better go back for the same brand Apec RO
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a nice product
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a nice product. The install was not too complicated to install given the instructions were clear. The water tastes good and seems good quality no leaks under the sink. What I don't like is that when the tank is filling sometimes the lines shutter and vibrate. Another problem is the flow restrictor seems to allow a constant trickle to the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Abigail  Martin

customer_reviews.title: RO
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does.., the installation is pretty straightforward once you watch the install video on YouTubeafew times while having the equipment with you- it makes it easier to understand which hose connects where...
customer_reviews.author: Jeriame

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The specialists at Express Water went above and beyond the call of duty on this one folks! I highly recommend this product. I am highly impressed because the unit practically installs itself. It's that simple.... Wow. [...] Kristian Herlofson
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Herlofson

customer_reviews.title: Great system with very good water output.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this system from a 3stage carbon system. The carbon system was great for several years and had pretty good tasting water output. I gave the old system to my parents and installed this system. The water taste and cleanliness is way better than the carbon only system. It's still a fairly new system for us so I can't speak on longevity. I'll update my review if something goes wrong but so far I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mermalion

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Test strips for quality showed the very best results.. High PH results too
customer_reviews.author: rauf diab

product_meta.title: Express Water Reverse Osmosis Alkaline Water Filtration System – 10 Stage RO Water Filter with Faucet and Tank – Under Sink Water Filter – with Alkaline Filter for Added Essential Minerals – 100 GPD
product_meta.description: Make the purest alkaline mineral water with your own home alkaline water system. Great in the kitchen: Improve the taste of your cooking, coffee, ice, and drinks. Experience true Reverse Osmosis purification. Safe filtered fresh tasting H2O: Removes up to 99.99% of contaminants including Lead, Chlorine, Fluoride, Cyanide, Giardia, Radium, Asbestos, Calcite, Heavy Metal, Bacteria, Viruses, Pharmaceuticals, and over 100 other contaminants. Get setup fast with our Quick Connect tubing system. Long lasting filters of the highest capacity standards mean you only need to change your filters every six months. Includes fast flow faucet with 0.8 GPM delivery. A compact system made to fit under a sink in a cabinet. Best for house, apartment, residential, well water, industrial, rv, machine, and office uses. Certified by an independent laboratory to NSF standard 58es with 4 gallon (3.2 gallon water capacity) storage tank and tank stand. Your tank can sit upright or on it’s side to make sure it fits under most kitchen cabinets. Includes all filters needed for setup and first 6 months of use. Can be wall / cabinet mounted or freestanding, made for indoor use. Can be installed undersink, in a basement, or other remote locations, you may need additional tubing or a delivery pump depending on how far away you plan to install or if you plan to link to a refrigerator as well. For every one gallon of water produced the system discharges between one and three gallons (depending on the pressure and quality of your incoming water). The system is compatible with 3/8" and 1/2" under sink connections. Includes filter housing wrench. Operates on 40-80 PSI water pressure, you may need a Booster Pump or Pressure Regulator depending on your water pressure. The water is cleaner and more convenient than any pitcher, faucet filter, or countertop systems. Express Water’s 10 Stage Reverse Osmosis Water Alkaline Filtration System ROALK10DCG is the complete solution for your drinking water.
feature_bullets: Reverse Osmosis Water Filter: Experience what water should taste like with the Express Water reverse osmosis water filtration system removing up to 99.99% of Lead, Chlorine, Fluoride, Nitrates, Calcium, Arsenic, Bacteria, and more
Alkaline Water Filter: Express Water’s Alkaline Water Filter with Active Mineral Technology adds Calcium, Potassium, Magnesium, and other minerals to your water

Under Sink Water Filter: Don’t waste money on professional installation. Express Water’s quick and easy-to-understand design means you can install and understand everything about your new water filtration system
Quality Guaranteed: Rest easy with our 1-year warranty on all Express Water Reverse Osmosis Water Systems

Under Sink Water Filter System: No need to mess with refilling or activating your water filter, Express Water’s water filtration systems automatically fill your water tank with high quality drinking water
Leak Detection: Each under sink water filter includes an emergency leak stop detector that shuts off water flow when it detects unwelcomed moisture

Customizable RO Water Filter System: Express Water home water filtration systems are fully upgradable and customizable with quick connecting fittings. Try additional filtration attachments including UV Water Filter, Deionization Water Filter, and more
On Demand Support: Support from experts who can answer any of your questions about your new water filter

specifications.Included Components: 4 gallon Water Storage Tank ◼ Tank Valve ◼ Deluxe Chrome RO Faucet ◼ Pressure Ga
